t: HMD is no longer selling Nokia-branded smartphones - Liliputing
s: January 12, 2025 - You can still buy a Nokia-branded phone from HMD. It’s just the company is now only using the name for low-cost feature phones with smaller screens, number pads, and simpler hardware and software.
